column5: I'd like to pickup some gulp minnows tomorrow and wondering about what colour to get. I mainly fish the Thames and its reservoirs...mostly stained water as you know. What colour do you think would be best? Assorted, Smelt, watermelon, black shad.
I often catch smallies on the Thames using watermelon heavy weight worms. One of the best colours I have found if that helps any......
Interesting...never really use worms but from a jig perspectice white always seemed to be the best colour.
